## Summary

<p>With more than five years of experience in Business Intelligence and Data Science, I have collaborated with international companies such as Samsung, InBev, Bayer, and Honda. My professional journey spans a variety of business domains, including marketing, operations management, and customer experience.</p>
<p>As a Data Scientist, I have integrated cross-functional teams to deliver data-driven solutions, establish data governance frameworks, and apply advanced analytics to extract valuable insights.</p>
<p>Currently, I am enhancing my skills through a master's degree in Behavioral Data Science at the University of Barcelona. This program is enriching my abilities in data analysis, statistical modeling, machine learning, deep learning, and data visualization using R and Python. It also deepens my understanding of psychology and behavioral economics, focusing on psychographics, predictive behavioral modeling, and psychometrics. This educational experience is empowering me to apply data science in more empathetic and impactful ways.</p>
